title: Now, you can take a Royal Enfield bike on rent in over two dozen cities. Here's how
description: Royal Enfield has launched a program called "Royal Enfield Rentals" that allows bike enthusiasts to rent their motorcycles. The program collaborates with motorcycle rental operators across India, offering a diverse portfolio of over 300 Royal Enfield motorcycles in 25 cities. This initiative aims to enhance access to Royal Enfield bikes and support the motorcycle rental operators who contribute to the brand's ecosystem.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
cleaned_content: you can now subscribe to our economic times whatsapp channel
